comments:
Whenever I try to update the software using the Find and Install option (search for updates of the currently installed features), I get the dialog box with the message "network connection problems encountered during search."

I searched the bugzilla database and found one solution that said "javaw.exe is not able to access the Internet."

I searched and found javaw.exe in multiple places and I added most of the missing ones to my Personal firewall rules. This hasn't cleared the problem.

If this is still the cause, which javaw.exe does Eclipse use to perform software updates?

I'm pasting part of the eclipse log below.

Thank you for your help.

Raman

I figured out my problem. It was the personal firewall that was blocking the access. One of the entries for javaw.exe was blocked. The prblem would have been more easily apparent if the firewall listed the location of the javaw.exe along with the description.

Raman
